entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 10:50AM AKST until December 15 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulation around 1 inch. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility of one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island.
entry.cap:areaDesc: St Lawrence Island

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida...
